scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment variables loaded successfully'); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT); console.log('MONGODB_URI:', process.env.MONGODB_URI ? 'Set' : 'Not set'); console.log('GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID:', process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID ? 'Set' : 'Not set');"
